headline.main: WILLKIE RALLIES HIS PARTY ON WAR; Appeal Signed by 6 Governors, Other Leaders, Bids Congress Repeal Neutrality Act

lead_paragraph: Declaring that millions of Republicans are determined to wipe the "ugly smudge of isolationism" from the face of the party, Wendell L. Willkie called on Republican members of Congress yesterday, in a message signed by leading Republicans of the nation, to repeal the Neutrality Act as a "hypocritical and degrading" law that now serves Axis interests by hampering United States aid to Britain.
